amendment.description: Amendment sought to link state authorization regulations to student outcomes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-404 to link state authorization regulations to student outcomes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A003) Failed by voice vote.
